snippet: The retail giant ends health coverage for thousands of its employees.
abstract: Editorial calls on Target to raise wages in order to offset loss of company contributions as it phases out health insurance for part-time workers; warns taxpayers will otherwise end up footing the bill as company saves money and workers turn to new insurance exchanges for coverage.
lead_paragraph: The retail giant ends health coverage for thousands of its employees.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
